# AUDIO::IS_ANY_POSITIONAL_SPEECH_PLAYING

## Summary
Checks if any ped-independent positional scripted speech (ie. triggered using PLAY_AMBIENT_SPEECH_FROM_POSITION_NATIVE) is currently playing

## Returns
* **BOOL**
